attributes.action: compensate all ex european prisoners of war 1939/1945
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the far east prisoners of war were rightly compensated by both the U.K. government and the Australian government, the Australian government after a commission report decided that European ex prisoners of  war suffered exactly the same hardship as the far east prisoners of war therefore they have over the last 2 years compensated all of their european ex prisoners of war or their widows yet after many requests  our government will not compensate U.K.  European ex prisoners of war or their widows,
if a country like Australia can afford this compensation why cant the U.K. government we want justice for our European ex prisoners of war held captive during world war 2 .
